compatibility.notes: The GPL-1.0-or-later license has a strong copyleft effect, meaning that any derivative work must also be licensed under GPL-1.0-or-later or a compatible license. This applies to both static and dynamic linking.

key_requirements: Ensure that all recipients of the software receive the same rights you have.
Provide access to the source code for any distributed binaries.
Maintain the GPL license terms in any derivative works.
license.name: GPL-1.0-or-later
obligations: Distribute copies of the source code when distributing the software.
Include a copy of the GPL license with any distributed software.
Include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
State any changes made to the original software when distributing modified versions.
Distribute modified versions under the same GPL license.
